text.section: Grievance - A grievance is a complaint regarding an alleged violation, misinterpretation or misapplication of any provision(s) of this Agreement; provided:
If a specific section of this Contract limits the parameters and use of this grievance procedure, such limitations shall be followed.
Appropriate Administrator - The Administrator at the lowest level who has authority to consider the grievance.
Grievant - The "grievant" shall mean the employee(s) or the ASSOCIATION filing the grievance.
Days - The term "days" shall mean calendar days.
